output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the ballot).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (500,001-1,000,000 people) - Promotes a public march in Suceava - Uses multiple hashtags to increase visibility
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly promotes a "March of Support for George Simion" - Uses hashtags like #georgesimionpresedinte - Clearly intended to gather support for the presidential candidate - The timing (Nov 22) is after the end of the presidential campaign period
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - It's a call to action/event promotion - Uses campaign slogans and promotional language
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an organized campaign activity - Paid promotion by a company (SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL) - Structured as a campaign event announcement

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This clearly constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It's promoting a campaign event - It's occurring after the legal campaign period for presidential elections - It uses campaign-specific hashtags and messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui marș de susținere pentru candidatul prezidențial George Simion după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea cu ID-ul 568354982553353 reprezintă propagandă electorală explicită prin organizarea și promovarea unui eveniment de susținere a candidatului, folosind hashtag-uri precum #georgesimionpresedinte și promovând un marș electoral. Reclama a fost activa și după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale. Impactul a fost semnificativ, atingând între 500.001 și 1.000.000 de persoane pe platformele Facebook și Instagram.
